#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>
#include <string.h>
#include <ctype.h>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;
#define lli long long int
int main()
{
    int t,n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
              cin>>n;
              if(n%2==0)
              cout<<"Valar Morghulis"<<endl;
              else
              cout<<"Lannisters always pays their debts"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
